@Bean
public CacheFactory cacheFactory(
    RedisConnectionFactory connectionFactory,
    ObjectMapper objectMapper
) {

    RedisTemplate<String, byte[]> redisTemplate = 
        RedisCaches.cacheRedisTemplate(connectionFactory);

    return new CacheFactory() {

        @Override
        public Cache<?, ?> createObjectCache(@NotNull ImmutableType type) {
            ...çœç•¥ä»£ç ...
        }

        // å°†å½“å‰å¯¹è±¡idæ˜ å°„ä¸ºå…³è”å¯¹è±¡id
        // é€‚ç”¨äºä¸€å¯¹ä¸€å’Œå¤šå¯¹ä¸€å…³è”å±æ€§
        @Override
        public Cache<?, ?> createAssociatedIdCache(@NotNull ImmutableProp prop) {
            return createPropCache(prop, Duration.ofMinutes(10));
        }

        // å°†å½“å‰å¯¹è±¡idæ˜ å°„ä¸ºå…³è”å¯¹è±¡idé›†åˆ
        // é€‚ç”¨äºä¸€å¯¹å¤šå’Œå¤šå¯¹å¤šå…³è”å±æ€§
        @Override
        public Cache<?, ?> createAssociatedIdCache(@NotNull ImmutableProp prop) {
            return createPropCache(prop, Duration.ofMinutes(5));
        }

        private <K, V> Cache<K, V> createPropCache(ImmutableProp prop, Duration duration) {
            return new ChainCacheBuilder<>()
                .add(
                    new CaffeineBinder<>(512, Duration.ofSeconds(1))
                )
                .add(
                    new RedisValueBinder<>(
                        redisTemplate, 
                        objectMapper, 
                        prop, 
                        duration
                    )
                )
                .build();
        }

        ...çœç•¥å…¶ä»–ä»£ç ...
    };
}
@Bean
fun cacheFactory(
    connectionFactory: RedisConnectionFactory,
    objectMapper: ObjectMapper
): KCacheFactory {

    val redisTemplate = RedisCaches.cacheRedisTemplate(connectionFactory)

    return object: KCacheFactory {

        override fun createObjectCache(type: ImmutableType): Cache<*, *>? =
            ...çœç•¥ä»£ç ...

        // å°†å½“å‰å¯¹è±¡idæ˜ å°„ä¸ºå…³è”å¯¹è±¡id
        // é€‚ç”¨äºä¸€å¯¹ä¸€å’Œå¤šå¯¹ä¸€å…³è”å±æ€§
        override fun createAssociatedIdCache(prop: ImmutableProp): Cache<*, *>? =
            createPropCache(prop, Duration.ofMinutes(10))

        // å°†å½“å‰å¯¹è±¡idæ˜ å°„ä¸ºå…³è”å¯¹è±¡idé›†åˆ
        // é€‚ç”¨äºä¸€å¯¹å¤šå’Œå¤šå¯¹å¤šå…³è”å±æ€§
        override fun createAssociatedIdListCache(prop: ImmutableProp): Cache<*, List<*>>? =
            createPropCache(prop, Duration.ofMinutes(5))

        private fun <K, V> createPropCache(prop: ImmutableProp, duration: Duration): Cache<K, V>  =
            ChainCacheBuilder<Any, Any>()
                .add(
                    CaffeineBinder(512, Duration.ofSeconds(1))
                )
                .add(
                    RedisValueBinder(
                        redisTemplate, 
                        objectMapper, 
                        prop, 
                        duration
                    )
                )
                .build()

        ...çœç•¥å…¶ä»–ä»£ç ...
    }
}

    @Entity
    public interface BookStore {

        @OneToMany(
            mappedBy = "store",
            orderedProps = {
                    @OrderedProp("name"),
                    @OrderedProp(value = "edition", desc = true)
            }
        )
        List<Book> books();

BookStoreTable table = BookStoreTable.$;
List<BookStore> stores = sqlClient
    .createQuery(table)
    .select(
        table.fetch(
            BookStoreFetcher.$
                .allScalarFields()
                .books(
                    BookFetcher.$
                        .allScalarFields()
                )
        )
    )
    .execute();
System.out.println(stores);

    .createQuery(BookStore::class) {
        select(
            table.fetchBy {
                allScalarFields()
                books {
                    allScalarFields()
                }
            }
        )
    }
    .execute()
println(stores)

  • Java

BookTable table = BookTable.$;
List<Book> books = sqlClient
    .createQuery(table)
    .where(table.edition().eq(1))
    .select(
        table.fetch(
            BookFetcher.$
                .allScalarFields()
                .authors(
                    AuthorFetcher.$
                        .allScalarFields()
                )
        )
    )
    .execute();
System.out.println(books);
val books = sqlClient
    .createQuery(Book::class) {
        where(table.edition eq 1)
        select(
            table.fetchBy {
                allScalarFields()
                authors {
                    allScalarFields()
                }
            }
        )
    }
    .execute()
println(books)

    è¿™4æ¡BOOKçš„ä¸»é”®IDä¸º1ã€4ã€7å’Œ10ã€‚

    Jimmerå…ˆä»RedisæŸ¥æ‰¾æ•°æ®ï¼Œè¢«æŸ¥æ‰¾çš„é”®ä¸ºBook.authors-1ã€Book.authors-4ã€Book.authors-7å’ŒBook.authors-10ã€‚

    å‡è®¾æ— æ³•åœ¨Redisä¸­æ‰¾åˆ°è¿™äº›é”®æ‰€å¯¹åº”çš„æ•°æ®

    127.0.0.1:6379> keys Book.authors-*
    (empty array)

    æ‰€ä»¥ï¼Œæ‰§è¡Œå¦‚ä¸‹SQLï¼Œä»æ•°æ®åº“åŠ è½½æ•°æ®

    select
        tb_1_.BOOK_ID,
        tb_1_.AUTHOR_ID
    from BOOK_AUTHOR_MAPPING tb_1_
    inner join AUTHOR tb_3_
        on tb_1_.AUTHOR_ID = tb_3_.ID
    where
        tb_1_.BOOK_ID in (
            ? /* 1 */, ? /* 4 */, ? /* 7 */, ? /* 10 */
        )
    order by
        tb_3_.FIRST_NAME asc,
        tb_3_.LAST_NAME asc
    å¤‡æ³¨

    å¦‚æœä¸é€šè¿‡@ManyToMany.orderedPropsä¸ºå…³è”å±æ€§Book.authorsæŒ‡å®šé»˜è®¤æ’åºï¼Œè¿™é‡Œå°±çš„joinä¸ä¼šå‡ºç°

ä¿®æ”¹BOOKè¡¨çš„å¤–é”®STORE_IDï¼ŒJimmerè‡ªåŠ¨åˆ é™¤å¤šå¯¹ä¸€å…³è”Book.storeå’Œä¸€å¯¹å¤šBookStore.booksçš„å…³è”ç¼“å­˜

  • å‡å¦‚å¯ç”¨äº†BinLogè§¦å‘å™¨ï¼Œç”¨ä»»ä½•æ‰‹æ®µä¿®æ”¹æ•°æ®åº“éƒ½å¯ä»¥å¯¼è‡´Jimmerç¼“å­˜ä¸€è‡´æ€§çš„ä»‹å…¥ã€‚æ¯”å¦‚ç›´æ¥åœ¨SQL IDEä¸­æ‰§è¡Œå¦‚ä¸‹SQL

    update BOOK 
    /* Old value: 1, New value: 2 */
    set STORE_ID = 2 
    where ID = 7;

  • å‡å¦‚åªå¯ç”¨äº†Transactionè§¦å‘å™¨ï¼Œåˆ™å¿…é¡»ç”¨Jimmerçš„APIä¿®æ”¹æ•°æ®åº“

    • Java
    • Kotlin
    BookTable table = BookTable.$;
    sqlClient
        .createUpdate(table)
        // Old value: 1L, New value: 2L
        .set(table.store().id, 2L)
        .where(table.id().eq(7L))
        .execute();
    sqlClient
        .createUpdate(Book::class) {
            // Old value: 1L, New value: 2L
            set(table.store.id, 2L)
            where(table.id eq 7L)
        }
        .execute()
